description.0: @EU_Health @EMA_News If you want full vaccination, just bring an inactivated-virus vaccine to all people and stop imposing the mRNA with terroristic propagandistic threats. I wonder why didn\'t you make one like Valneva or Sinopharm in the first place? All about money and power...
description.1: Syria on Sunday received 500,000 doses of Chinese Sinopharm COVID-19 vaccine, the latest in a string of vaccine batches reaching the war-torn country to overcome the pandemic. https://t.co/270o8EQQXX
description.2: Keith Rowley, prime minister of Trinidad and Tobago, received his additional primary dose of China\'s #Sinopharm #COVID19 vaccine on Friday. The PM received the first two shots of Sinopharm vaccines in July and August.ï¼People\'s Daily, Chinaï¼ https://t.co/5vQ6twyb4g
description.3: Austria denies viability of Sinopharm standard vaccine from China while Venezuela rejoices in it\'s arrival. Tells you something right there doesn\'t it? https://t.co/mdJaOb3iwa
description.4: @FaheemYounus Hello Doctor, I have been vaccinated (2 doses) Sinopharm vaccine (2nd dose on May2021), can I/ Should I do a booster dose with Covishield? If so do I need 2 doses? Thanks for your reply in advance
description.5: Yuri Senko said that he is looking forward to deeper cooperation with Sinopharm Group in COVID-19\'s local vaccine filling and joint production, therapeutic drugs and investment cooperation.
description.6: @KasOosterhuis hello! did they ignore that you have sinopharm? or they just didn\'t read your certificate? sorry, i also have 2 sinopharm shots and i\'m worried that they won\'t let me in into the museums or restaurants if i don\'t have an EMA vaccine
